directions: Drain green and black olives and green chiles in a colander. Chop white onion in a food processor, pulsing several times. Add green and black olives, green chiles, tomatoes, olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic, and hot sauce to the processor. Pulse several more times to mix; process until chunky, 20 to 30 seconds.
ingredients: 1 1/2 (5 ounce) jars green olives (such as Italica®)
1 (6 ounce) can pitted black olives, or more to taste
1 large white onion, cut into large chunks
3 drops hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste
title: Fabulous Olive Salsa by James
